name: Kevin M-Adamovics Prototypes
description:
Prototype 1 - Infinite Tunnel

This is based off an illusion. Your mouse controls the direction of the tunnel as it continually creates the illusion of an Infinite Tunnel. *Epilepsy Warning*

Prototype 2 - Gravity Warehouse

The player controls an astronaut that is runs a supply depot on the moon. He must place the object in the correct locations while manoeuvring around the warehouse as gravity flips on him.

Prototype 3 - Catch me if you can!

Based of the game "Speedrunners", This split screen game challenges each player to beat there opponent while trying to make sure to ruin there game in certain ways.

Prototype 4 - Dating Sim.

You are on your first date, and your facial movements control the flow of this date. With the use of a webcam, the player controls the outcomes by either winking or blind. Be careful, she can be feisty.
